summary: An adaptation of a classic tale about a boy raised in jungles by animals.
cast: Lyusena Ovchinnikova|Aleksandr Nazarov|Anatoliy Papanov|Sergey Martinson|Lyudmila Kasatkina|Stepan Bubnov|Lev Lyubetskiy|Yuriy Khrzhanovskiy|Yuriy Puzyryov|Vladimir Ushakov|Oleg Vidov|Mariya Vinogradova|Tamara Dmitrieva|Klara Rumyanova|Lev Shabarin|Viktor Bubnov|Don Brown|Ian James Corlett|Dana Delany|Charlton Heston|Campbell Lane|Scott McNeil|Pauline Newstone|Valerie Milenka Repnau|Cathy Weseluck|Alec Willows
title: Maugli
